SVGTransform.summary: The SVGTransform interface reflects one of the component transformations within an ; thus, an SVGTransform object corresponds to a single component (e.g., scale(…) or matrix(…)) within a transform attribute.

remarks.para: An SVGTransform object can be designated as read only, which means that attempts to modify the object will result in an exception being thrown.

SVGTransformAngle.summary: The angle read-only property of the interface represents the angle of the transformation in degrees.

remarks.para: For SVG_TRANSFORM_ROTATE, SVG_TRANSFORM_SKEWX, and SVG_TRANSFORM_SKEWY, angle reflects the transformation's rotation or skewing angle.
For SVG_TRANSFORM_MATRIX, SVG_TRANSFORM_TRANSLATE and SVG_TRANSFORM_SCALE, angle will be zero.

SVGTransformAngle.value: An integer; the angle value in degrees as a float.

SVGTransformMatrix.summary: The matrix read-only property of the interface represents the transformation matrix that corresponds to the transformation type.

remarks.para: In case the matrix object is changed directly (i.e., without using the methods on the SVGTransform interface itself) then the type of the SVGTransform changes to SVG_TRANSFORM_MATRIX.

SVGTransformSetMatrix.summary: The setMatrix() method of the interface sets the transform type to SVG_TRANSFORM_MATRIX, with parameter matrix defining the new transformation.

remarks.para: Note that the values from the parameter matrix are copied, meaning changes to the matrix object after calling this method will not affect the transformation.

SVGTransformSetRotate.summary: The setRotate() method of the interface sets the transform type to SVG_TRANSFORM_ROTATE, with parameter angle defining the rotation angle and parameters cx and cy defining the optional center of rotation.

SVGTransformSetScale.summary: The setScale() method of the interface sets the transform type to SVG_TRANSFORM_SCALE, with parameters sx and sy defining the scale amounts.

SVGTransformSetSkewX.summary: The setSkewX() method of the interface sets the transform type to SVG_TRANSFORM_SKEWX, with parameter angle defining the amount of skew along the X-axis.

SVGTransformSetSkewY.summary: The setSkewY() method of the interface sets the transform type to SVG_TRANSFORM_SKEWY, with parameter angle defining the amount of skew along the Y-axis.

SVGTransformSetTranslate.summary: The setTranslate() method of the interface sets the transform type to SVG_TRANSFORM_TRANSLATE, with parameters tx and ty defining the translation amounts.

SVGTransformType.summary: The type read-only property of the interface represents the type of transformation applied, specified by one of the SVG_TRANSFORM_* constants defined on this interface.
SVGTransformType.value: An integer; the type of value as an unsigned short.
